description: Situated just a few minutes from the seafront promenade in a quiet, residential district, this restaurant with a relaxing ambience serves delicious Ligurian cuisine with a focus on organic vegetables, fish and seafood (local whenever possible), and home-made bread, desserts and fresh pasta. In summer, meals are served by the swimming pool in the garden, while in winter, the welcoming covered veranda boasts extensive sea views.
creditCards: ['Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
